column5: Just sat down and tried to switch on WFN (426). It is no longer free on Rogers.  A message comes up telling me to order.  It was good while it lasted.  Don't think i'll order it though.
AT least you had the free preview..Cogeco here never did. Still doesn't.
Xpressview goes till Jan 31st I believe...
I'm still getting it for free and I'm on rogers.  FHR
FHR I'm telling LOL Turned it on this evening and no WFN. Called to order it and they also gave me 5 channels free for 3 months. Gives me something to do in the winter.... Jose
Hey Salmon what do they charge and what other channels did you get?
this is why I HATE the cable companies and Rogers is by far THE WORST GOING... Get a Pansat and be done with it!    Gerritt

It's like $2 per month for it on Rogers.  I pay more for coffee in a day.  Go on, live a little and splurge for it.  If  you have a package you can add it and take out one of the channels you don't watch too much.  Joey
I switched to bell to get the WFN and WildTv too.  Love them both, when its over im subscibing for sure.
Not working for me either (Rogers customer).  But I'm going to swap out the Game Show Channel for it....

I have cogeco and i had it free for about a month or so.  I checked in on it  everyday and haven't got around to ordering it.  I have pirated express view which doesn't get it and now my cogeco doesn't get it.  Any idea what it costs a month.  Maybe i just have to change my free lifestyle package. right now i have leafs tv and sports but i get all that for free on the dish.  hmmmm  i guess i'll look into it.
I have it on rogers and would rather get rid of my wife than channel that has fishing 24/7.
I'm on Rogers and some of you guys are lucky, even though I would like to pay for WFN, it's not available in my area  fishchaser

Why would this be a reason to hate cable companies?  Is it because they don't include all stations for one standard price instead of providing a choice of getting a few channels for a lower price or lots of channels for a higher price?  They provided a free preview of a specialty channel; why would that make you hate them?
